title: Man Medium Light Skin Tone White Hair
alsoKnownAs: Person with white hair: medium-light skin tone
description: A man with a medium-light skin tone and white hair. This emoji represents an older man or someone with white hair, conveying a sense of age, wisdom, or experience.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man with medium-light skin tone and white hair emoji presents a distinguished and wise appearance. His hair is rendered with soft, wispy strands catching the light, emphasizing Apple's signature realistic lighting and smooth gradients. The facial expression is neutral yet approachable, with subtle shading that gives his features a gentle dimensionality, making him a versatile representation of experience and intellect in digital communication.
